widgets.title: Latest BCHR%
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'Buffer Hit Ratio %' FACET database

widgets.title: Latest LCHR
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'Library Cache Hit Ratio' FACET database

widgets.title: Latest DCHR
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'Dictionary Cache Hit Ratio' FACET database

widgets.title: Buffer Hit Ratio % last day
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'Buffer Hit Ratio %' FACET database SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 4 hour

widgets.title: Library Cache Hit Ratio Last Day
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'Library Cache Hit Ratio' FACET database SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 4 hour

widgets.title: Dictionary Cache Hit Ratio last day
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'Dictionary Cache Hit Ratio' FACET database SINCE 1 day ago TIMESERIES 4 hour

widgets.title: Long Table Scans Weekly Histogram
widgets.nrql: SELECT histogram(value, 500, 10) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName in ('Total long table scans') FACET database, queryName SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Weekly Scans
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName in ('Total long table scans', 'Total short table scans', 'Memory Sort Operations') FACET database, queryName SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Short Table Scans Weekly Histogram
widgets.nrql: SELECT histogram(value, 5000000, 10) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName in ('Total short table scans') FACET database, queryName SINCE 1 week ago
SELECT histogram(value, 500000, 10) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName in ('TotalWaits') FACET database, queryName SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Total Waits Weekly Trend
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName in ('TotalWaits') FACET database, queryName SINCE 1 week ago TIMESERIES 1 hour

widgets.title: Latest Memory Sort Operations
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'Memory Sort Operations' FACET database SINCE 5 minutes ago

widgets.title: Waits, Deadlocks, Rollbacks - Weekly
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName in ('EnqueueDeadlocks', 'TotalWaits', 'User Rollbacks') FACET database, queryName SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: User Rollbacks
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'User Rollbacks' FACET database SINCE 5 minutes ago

widgets.title: Enqueue Deadlocks
widgets.nrql: SELECT latest(value) FROM Oracle WHERE queryName = 'EnqueueDeadlocks' FACET database SINCE 5 minutes ago
